validationRules.block_id: Required - Unique identifier for the block
validationRules.title: Required - The heading text content (HTML allowed)
validationRules.tTag: Required - Semantic heading tag: h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
validationRules.tAlign.md: left, center, or right - Controls text alignment
validationRules.tColor: Text color - hex, rgb, rgba, or CSS color names
validationRules.tTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable typography settings
validationRules.tTypo.fontSize: Font size with responsive breakpoints (md/sm/xs) and unit
validationRules.tStroke.tpgbReset: Must be 1 to enable stroke effect
validationRules.tStroke.tstWidth: Stroke width - responsive with unit (px recommended)
validationRules.tStroke.tstColor: Stroke color - works independently of tColor
validationRules.tShadow.openShadow: Must be 1 to enable text shadow
validationRules.tblendm: CSS mix-blend-mode - overlay, multiply, screen, etc.
validationRules.anchor: Optional - HTML ID for linking (no # symbol, alphanumeric + hyphens)
validationRules.glohoriOffset: Horizontal offset when position is absolute/fixed
validationRules.gloverticalOffset: Vertical offset when position is absolute/fixed
validationRules.gloabhorizoOri: 'left' or 'right' - horizontal origin for positioning (undefined = needs manual setting)
validationRules.gloabverticalOri: 'top' or 'bottom' - vertical origin for positioning (undefined = needs manual setting)

warnings: âš ï¸ Only use one H1 per page for SEO best practices (primary page title)
âš ï¸ Maintain proper heading hierarchy (H1 â†’ H2 â†’ H3, don't skip levels)
âš ï¸ tStroke requires tpgbReset=1 to activate (otherwise stroke settings ignored)
âš ï¸ tShadow requires openShadow=1 to activate (otherwise shadow ignored)
âš ï¸ tTypo requires openTypography=1 to activate (otherwise typography settings ignored)
âš ï¸ Transparent tColor with stroke creates hollow outline effect (ensure stroke is visible)
âš ï¸ tblendm (blend mode) requires background behind heading to see effect
âš ï¸ Blend modes may not work on all browsers (mainly modern browsers)
âš ï¸ globalPosition=absolute requires parent with position:relative
âš ï¸ gloabhorizoOri and gloabverticalOri required when using absolute/fixed positioning
âš ï¸ Very large fontSize values (>80px) may cause layout issues on mobile
âš ï¸ Linked headings (tLink) should be used sparingly for accessibility (not standard pattern)
âš ï¸ anchor IDs must be unique on the page (no duplicates)
âš ï¸ Wide letterSpacing on long titles can cause horizontal scroll on mobile
commonMistakes: âŒ Using multiple H1 tags on same page (SEO penalty, confuses screen readers)
âŒ Skipping heading levels (H1 â†’ H3 without H2 - breaks document structure)
âŒ Setting tStroke without tpgbReset=1 (stroke won't appear)
âŒ Setting tShadow without openShadow=1 (shadow won't appear)
âŒ Setting typography without openTypography=1 (settings ignored)
âŒ Using tColor='transparent' without stroke (invisible heading)
âŒ Setting blend mode on headings without backgrounds (no visible effect)
âŒ Using absolute positioning without defining gloabhorizoOri/gloabverticalOri
âŒ Forgetting responsive fontSize values (md/sm/xs) - poor mobile experience
âŒ Using very thin stroke (0.5px) that's barely visible on screens
âŒ Setting anchor ID with # symbol (should be 'main-heading' not '#main-heading')
âŒ Using target='_blank' for internal links (creates bad UX)
âŒ Not testing long titles on mobile (text may overflow or wrap awkwardly)
bestPractices: âœ… Use H1 only once per page for main title (SEO best practice)
âœ… Follow semantic hierarchy: H1 (page) â†’ H2 (sections) â†’ H3 (subsections) â†’ H4-H6 (details)
âœ… Set responsive fontSize for all breakpoints (md/sm/xs) to ensure mobile readability
âœ… Use fontWeight 700-900 for H1-H2, 600 for H3-H4, 500 for H5-H6
âœ… Keep lineHeight tight (1.1-1.3) for large headings, looser (1.4-1.6) for smaller ones
âœ… Use center alignment for hero H1 titles, left alignment for content headings
âœ… Apply letterSpacing (1-3px) on uppercase headings for better readability
âœ… Use stroke effects sparingly - best for hero sections and brand headers
âœ… Keep text shadows subtle (blur: 2-8px, low opacity 0.2-0.4) for readability
âœ… Use anchor IDs on major headings for table of contents and deep linking
âœ… Test color contrast - minimum 4.5:1 ratio for accessibility (WCAG AA)
âœ… Use semantic tTag values that match visual importance (don't use H6 for large text)
âœ… Combine stroke + transparent fill for modern outline effect on hero headings
âœ… Use blend modes (overlay, multiply) on headings over background images for better integration
âœ… Keep heading length reasonable (<10 words for H1, <15 words for H2-H6)
âœ… Use textTransform: 'uppercase' for short impactful titles, normal case for long titles
âœ… Apply tLink only when heading truly functions as navigation (rare use case)
âœ… Use globalPosition=absolute for overlay labels on images/cards
âœ… Test absolute positioning on all breakpoints - may need different offsets

accessibilityNotes: â™¿ Use semantic tTag values (H1-H6) in proper hierarchy - critical for screen readers
â™¿ Don't skip heading levels (H1 â†’ H2 â†’ H3, never H1 â†’ H3)
â™¿ Ensure color contrast of 4.5:1 minimum between text and background (WCAG AA)
â™¿ Test stroke + fill combinations for sufficient contrast
â™¿ Don't rely on color alone to convey meaning (add text/icons)
â™¿ Anchor IDs enable keyboard navigation and screen reader jumping
â™¿ Linked headings (tLink) should have clear purpose - not standard pattern
â™¿ Test with screen readers to verify heading structure announcement
â™¿ Very large font sizes can cause zoom issues - test with 200% zoom
â™¿ Ensure blend modes don't reduce readability for low-vision users
â™¿ Text shadows should enhance, not reduce readability (avoid too dark/heavy)
performanceConsiderations: âš¡ Text stroke (-webkit-text-stroke) is well-supported but can impact rendering
âš¡ Text shadows are GPU-accelerated but multiple shadows increase cost
âš¡ Mix-blend-mode can cause repaints - use sparingly on animated sections
âš¡ Custom web fonts add load time - ensure font-display: swap in CSS
âš¡ Very large fontSize values (>100px) increase paint time
âš¡ Absolute positioning creates new stacking context - test z-index
âš¡ Linked headings (tLink.url) add extra DOM nodes for <a> wrapping
âš¡ Responsive typography (md/sm/xs) adds media queries - minimal impact
âš¡ Multiple text effects (stroke + shadow + blend) stack rendering cost
âš¡ Test scroll performance with absolutely positioned headings (layout reflow)
